sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(A.REPORT_CODE) FROM REPORT A, EMP B WHERE A.EMP_CODE = B.EMP_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = #emp_code# AND A.REPORT_PL_STATUS in ('i','k','x' ) AND A.REPORT_PM_STATUS in ('i','k','x' ) AND A.REPORT_DELETE_DEV_SEND = 'n'

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORT_CODE) FROM REPORT A, EMP B WHERE A.EMP_CODE = B.EMP_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE_PL = #emp_code# AND A.EMP_CODE_PL != A.EMP_CODE AND A.REPORT_PL_STATUS IN ('i' ,'k','x') AND A.REPORT_PM_STATUS IN ('i' ,'k','x') AND A.REPORT_DELETE_PL_REC = 'n'

SELECT COUNT(A.REPORT_CODE) FROM REPORT A, EMP B WHERE A.EMP_CODE = B.EMP_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE_PM = #emp_code# AND A.REPORT_PL_STATUS IN ('k','x') AND A.REPORT_PM_STATUS IN ('i' ,'k','x') AND A.REPORT_DELETE_PM_REC = 'n'

select b.* from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (SELECT A.REPORT_CODE,A.REPORT_TITLE,B.EMP_NAME,A.REPORT_DAY,A.REPORT_PL_STATUS,A.REPORT_PM_STATUS,A.REPORT_SAVE_DEV FROM REPORT A, EMP B WHERE A.EMP_CODE = B.EMP_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = #emp_code# AND A.REPORT_PL_STATUS in ('i','k','x' ) AND A.REPORT_PM_STATUS in ('i','k','x' ) AND A.REPORT_DELETE_DEV_SEND = 'n'
order by report_code asc ) a ) b
where b.rnum <= #startCount# and b.rnum >= #endCount#
order by b.rnum desc

SELECT A.REPORT_TITLE,A.REPORT_CONTENT,A.REPORT_DATE,B.EMP_NAME,C.PW_FUNCTION,D.PROJECT_NAME,A.REPORT_CODE,B.EMP_CODE,A.REPORT_SAVE_DEV FROM REPORT A, EMP B, PW C, PROJECT D,JOIN E WHERE A.EMP_CODE = B.EMP_CODE AND A.PW_CODE = C.PW_CODE AND C.PROJECT_CODE = D.PROJECT_CODE AND D.PROJECT_CODE = E.PROJECT_CODE AND A.REPORT_CODE = #report_code# GROUP BY A.REPORT_TITLE,A.REPORT_CONTENT,A.REPORT_DATE,B.EMP_NAME,C.PW_FUNCTION,D.PROJECT_NAME,A.REPORT_CODE ,B.EMP_CODE,A.REPORT_SAVE_DEV

SELECT C.EMP_CODE,C.EMP_NAME,A.POSITION_NAME,C.EMP_DEPARTMENT,C.EMP_LEVEL, D.REPORT_PL_STATUS,D.REPORT_PM_STATUS,C.EMP_DEPARTMENT FROM JOIN A, PROJECT B, EMP C,REPORT D WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = B.PROJECT_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND C.EMP_CODE = D.EMP_CODE AND B.PROJECT_CODE = #project_code# AND A.POSITION_NAME IN ('PM','PL')

select join_pm.position_name as pm_position ,table_position_pl.* from join join_pm , (select join_pl.position_name as pl_position ,table_pm.* from join join_pl , (select emp_pm.emp_name as pm_name ,emp_pm.emp_level as pm_level , table_pl.* from emp emp_pm , (select emp_pl.emp_name as pl_name ,emp_pl.emp_level as pl_level , table_report.* from emp emp_pl , ( select report.* , pw.project_code as project_code from report ,pw where report_code =#report_code# and report.pw_code = pw.pw_code) table_report where emp_pl.emp_code = table_report.emp_code_pl) table_pl where emp_pm.emp_code = table_pl.emp_code_pm) table_pm where join_pl.emp_code = table_pm.emp_code_pl and table_pm.project_code = join_pl.project_code
) table_position_pl where join_pm.emp_code = table_position_pl.emp_code_pm and join_pm.project_code = table_position_pl.project_code
SELECT B.PROJECT_NAME, B.PROJECT_CODE FROM JOIN A, PROJECT B, EMP C WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = B.PROJECT_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = #emp_code#

SELECT C.EMP_CODE,C.EMP_NAME,A.POSITION_NAME,C.EMP_DEPARTMENT,C.EMP_LEVEL FROM JOIN A, PROJECT B, EMP C WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = B.PROJECT_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND B.PROJECT_CODE = #project_code# AND A.POSITION_NAME IN ('PM','PL')

SELECT C.EMP_CODE,C.EMP_NAME,A.POSITION_NAME,C.EMP_DEPARTMENT,C.EMP_LEVEL FROM JOIN A, PROJECT B, EMP C WHERE A.PROJECT_CODE = B.PROJECT_CODE AND A.EMP_CODE = C.EMP_CODE AND B.PROJECT_CODE = #project_code# AND A.POSITION_NAME = 'PM'
